headline: Why Analysts See Amazon.com (AMZN) Story Shifting As Cloud And AI Spending Repriced
summary: Amazon.com’s fair value estimate has just been trimmed from about US$295.61 to roughly US$285.08, a modest shift that reflects fresh analyst work rather than a wholesale change of view on the company. Behind that move, researchers have nudged their discount rate slightly higher to around 8.58% and fine tuned long term revenue growth assumptions to about 11.93% as they balance enthusiasm for AWS and advertising with closer scrutiny of capital heavy cloud and AI spending. Stay with this article...
